name: El Stretchopus
description:
*If you wanna play on mobile you can open this page as a desktop site and scale the screen to the appropriate size.

I have a build that scales properly as well as an android apk ready for upload but I have to wait for the jam to end.


Made in 72 hours for ScoreSpace Jam #9 by Ben Flavell - Tap and hold to grab onto a wall - Drag and release to launch yourself - Tap to hop when not in front of a wall - Try to stay above the bottom of the screen - Don't touch the coral or pufferfish

Updates coming after the jam:

- Android build

- Pause menu

- Local high score saving

- Fix scaling for mobile web

Font: Bakso Sapi (https://www.dafont.com/bakso-sapi.font)

"Beauty Flow" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
